title: Kite Liberator
synopsis: In the previous series "Kite," a killer—Sawa—suddenly disappears after she avenges her parents' death, and no one knows where she is.
staff: [['Umetsu, Yasuomi', ['Director', ' Character Design']], ['Shimizu, Katsunori', ['Sound Director']], ['Kodama, Saori', ['Theme Song Lyrics']], ['Ishihama, Masashi', ['Original Character Design', ' Key Animation']]]
